actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 95-320.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of the rules, roll call #427 (253-158).

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the salaries of the chairman and members of the Federal Reserve Board and of the Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 95-320) Upgrades the positions of Director of the Office of Management and Budget from position II to position I of the Executive Schedule and the Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget from position III to position II of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the salaries of the chairman and members of the Federal Reserve Board and of the Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget.
